LanguageData.ROMV_HI_Thinblooded: Thinblooded\n\nNote: Thinbloods cannot make new vampires, and their powers take twice as much vitae.
LanguageData.ROMV_VitaeDesc: Once blood enters a vampire's system, it becomes vitae, the source of a vampire's power. This blood infected with the curse of Caine can be gained after feeding on the blood of others. Vampires use one blood point to animate their undead bodies from sleeping each day. Low blood can make a vampire unleash its inner beast.
LanguageData.ROMV_FeedMode_Tip: Blood Feed Mode\n\nThis determines what and how this vampire acquires its vitae by itself. Non-lethal mode will drain targets, but never drain them dry. Lethal mode will drain the target for as much vitae as possible disregarding the safety of the victim.
